storyBible.logline: A street musician discovers magic in the subway tunnels.
storyBible.characters:
- Alex: A talented but struggling musician seeking recognition.
- The Shadows: Mysterious entities that respond to music.
storyBible.setting: A retrofuturistic subway system where music has power.
storyBible.plotOutline:
Act I - Discovery of magical echoes in the tunnels.
Act II - Learning to harness the power through music.
Act III - Confrontation with those who would silence the magic.

directorsVision: Moody neo-noir aesthetic with warm practical lighting, handheld intimacy, and emphasis on reflections and shadows. Film grain and anamorphic lens flares enhance the dreamlike quality.

scenes.title: The Discovery - Subway Platform
scenes.summary: Alex plays guitar alone on an empty subway platform at night. As the music echoes through the tunnels, mysterious shadows begin to respond, dancing in rhythm with the melody.

temporalContext.startMoment: Alex sits on a worn bench, tuning his guitar under flickering fluorescent lights. The platform is empty, last train departed.
temporalContext.endMoment: The shadows have fully materialized, swirling around Alex in a mesmerizing dance. His eyes widen with wonder and fear as he realizes the music has awakened something ancient.

shots.description: Wide establishing shot of the empty subway platform. Flickering lights cast long shadows. Alex sits alone on a bench, his guitar case open beside him.
Medium close-up on Alex's hands as they begin to strum the guitar. The first notes echo through the tunnel, reverberating off tile walls.
POV shot looking down the dark tunnel as shadows begin to shift and move in response to the music. Subtle at first, then more pronounced.
